text:
Hello All,

can we get company Id after submitting a form ?? I have to get company id after submitted a form to post process some custom stuff.

Can we use conditional logic for content alignment (center content and full-width) for theme dnd_sections for the styling aspect? My goal is to achieve this using a coded template, I know on-page editor it can be done, but somehow to visualize different styling if the section has "center content" styling used.
Hey <@U02S5Q1Q6N8>, you should be able to access this by doing `{{ dynamic_page_hubdb_row.positiontype.name }}`to display the name part. Let me know if that works for you :slightly_smiling_face:
